name: Anonymous
message:
Congratulations on the bold move to go from employment to contracting. I’ve been thinking about this for a few months now, but am still afraid to make the move (yet).
I’d appreciate if you can blog about the kind of legal details one needs to be aware of – any information/pointers that you can provide would be very helpful for people like me who are thinking of going into full time contracting position.
Best luck.
